item.title: Poster at CogSci2019
item.description: It’s not the treasure, it’s the hunt. Children are more explorative on an explore-exploit task than adults

item.title: UCI Undergraduate Research Symposium 2019
item.description: Eight of my undergraduate research assistants will be presenting our research at the UROP symposium.

item.title: 70 kids in 2 weeks!
item.description: My undergraduate research assistants and I collected data from 70 kids in two weeks, new lab record!
